mapper.select: SELECT tl.team_idx, (SELECT logo FROM team t WHERE t.team_idx = tl.team_idx) as logo, (SELECT team_name FROM team t WHERE t.team_idx = tl.team_idx) as team_name FROM team_list tl WHERE id = #{param1};
SELECT notice_idx, notice_time, notice_content FROM notice where id = #{param1} ORDER BY notice_idx desc
SELECT id, point FROM member where id = #{param1};
